div.p: ( a) The inter-annual change in ANPP (ANPP effect = current year ANPP/prior year ANPP) and the inter-annual change in growing season N (N effect = current year N/prior year N) in experimental pots, and regression statistics. ( b) The inter-annual change in growing season N (N effect = current year N/prior year N) and the percentage of litter remaining (100% X litter in Sept/prior year ANPP) in experimental pots, and regression statistics. ( c) Relative abundance of fast ( P. pratensis) to slow ( P. smithii) decomposing plants at each site with each plant source after grasshoppers were present in experimental pots. The number of plants sampled are also provided.
